title: Who is Arvid Lindblad? Red Bull junior has F1 race weekend debut at Silverstone
summary: Red Bull protege Arvid Lindblad made his F1 race weekend debut at the 2025 British Grand Prix when he drove Yuki Tsunoda's Red Bull in FP1 â€” but who is Red Bull's next great hope?
